source.9cc50d2b:
import pandas as pd
from matplotlib import pyplot as plt
data = pd.read_csv('../input/csvdata/data.csv')
plt.plot(data.Second[1:400:10],data.Volt[1:400:10])
plt.xticks(rotation=90, ha='right')
plt.xlabel('Time')
plt.ylabel('Voltage')
plt.show()

import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
image = plt.imread('../input/images/rose.jpg')
plt.imshow(image)
plt.show()
